text: Jay Olcutt Sanders (born April 16, 1953) is an American actor and playwright. He was born in Austin, Texas. Sanders is known for his roles in JFK (1991) and The Day After Tomorrow (2004). He appears in plays at The Public Theatre in New York City. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Jay O. Sanders Audiography *eBooks and/or Audio Books by Jay O. title: Jay O. Sanders
